elements.name: Authorization Information Qualifier
elements.notes: Code to identify the type of information in the Authorization Information

elements.name: Authorization Information
elements.notes: Information used for additional identification or authorization of the interchange sender or the data in the interchange; the type of information is set by the Authorization Information Qualifier (I01)

elements.name: Security Information Qualifier
elements.notes: Code to identify the type of information in the Security Information

elements.name: Security Information
elements.notes: This is used for identifying the security information about the interchange sender or the data in the interchange; the type of information is set by the Security Information Qualifier (I03)

elements.name: Interchange Sender ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Qualifier to designate the system/method of code structure used to designate the sender or receiver ID element being qualified

elements.name: Interchange Sender ID
elements.notes: Identification code published by the sender for other parties to use as the receiver ID to route data to them; the sender always codes this value in the sender ID element

elements.name: Interchange Receiver ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Qualifier to designate the system/method of code structure used to designate the sender or receiver ID element being qualified

elements.name: Interchange Receiver ID
elements.notes: Identification code published by the receiver of the data; When sending, it is used by the sender as their sending ID, thus other parties sending to them will use this as a receiving ID to route data to them

elements.name: Interchange Date
elements.notes: Date of the interchange

elements.name: Interchange Time
elements.notes: Time of the interchange

elements.name: Interchange Control Standards Identifier
elements.notes: Code to identify the agency responsible for the control standard used by the message that is enclosed by the interchange header and trailer

elements.name: Interchange Control Version Number
elements.notes: This version number covers the interchange control segments

elements.name: Interchange Control Number
elements.notes: A control number assigned by the interchange sender

elements.name: Acknowledgment Requested
elements.notes: Code sent by the sender to request an interchange acknowledgment (TA1)

elements.name: Usage Indicator
elements.notes: Code to indicate whether data enclosed by this interchange envelope is test, production or information

elements.name: Component Element Separator
elements.notes: Type is not applicable; the component element separator is a delimiter and not a data element; this field provides the delimiter used to separate component data elements within a composite data structure; this value must be different than the data element separator and the segment terminator

elements.name: Functional Identifier Code
elements.notes: Code identifying a group of application related transaction sets

elements.name: Application Sender's Code
elements.notes: Code identifying party sending transmission; codes agreed to by trading partners

elements.name: Application Receiver's Code
elements.notes: Code identifying party receiving transmission. Codes agreed to by trading partners

elements.name: Date
elements.notes: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

elements.name: Time
elements.notes: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD

elements.name: Group Control Number
elements.notes: Assigned number originated and maintained by the sender

elements.name: Responsible Agency Code
elements.notes: Code used in conjunction with Data Element 480 to identify the issuer of the standard

elements.name: Version / Release / Industry Identifier Code
elements.notes: Code indicating the version, release, subrelease, and industry identifier of the EDI standard being used, including the GS and GE segments; if code in DE455 in GS segment is X, then in DE 480 positions 1-3 are the version number; positions 4-6 are the release and subrelease, level of the version; and positions 7-12 are the industry or trade association identifiers (optionally assigned by user); if code in DE455 in GS segment is T, then other formats are allowed

name: Transaction Set Header
notes: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

elements.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
elements.notes: Code identifying a Transaction Set

elements.name: Transaction Set Control Number
elements.notes: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Set Purpose Code
elements.notes: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Order Type Code
elements.notes: Code identifying the type of Purchase Order

elements.name: Purchase Order Number
elements.notes: Identifying numer for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

elements.name: Release Number
elements.notes: Number identifying a release against a Purchase Order previously placed by the parties involved in the transaction

elements.name: Date
elements.notes: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

elements.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
elements.notes: Code identifying the Reference Identification

elements.name: Reference Identification
elements.notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

name: Date/Time Reference
notes: To specify pertinent dates and times

elements.name: Date/Time Qualifier
elements.notes: Code to identify the type of information in the Authorization Information

elements.name: Date
elements.notes: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

segments.name: Party Identification
segments.notes: To identify a party by type of organization, name, and code

elements.name: Entity Identifier Code
elements.notes: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

elements.name: Name
elements.notes: Free-form name

elements.name: Identification Code Qualifier

data_type_ids.92: Assigned by Buyer or Buyer's Agent

elements.notes: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

elements.name: Identification Code
elements.notes: Code identifying a party or other code

segments.name: Baseline Item Data
segments.notes: To specify basic and most frequently used line item data

elements.name: Assigned Identification
elements.notes: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

elements.name: Quantity
elements.notes: Numeric value of quantity

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
elements.notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

elements.name: Unit Price
elements.notes: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

elements.name: Basis of Unit Price Code
elements.notes: Code identifying the type of unit price for an item

elements.name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
elements.notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

elements.name: Product/Service ID
elements.notes: Identifying number for a product or service

elements.name: Class of Trade Code
elements.notes: Code indicating class of trade

elements.name: Price Identifier Code
elements.notes: Code identifying pricing specification

elements.name: Unit Price
elements.notes: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

segments.name: Destination Quantity
segments.notes: To specify destination and quantity detail

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
elements.notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

elements.name: Identification Code Qualifier

data_type_ids.92: Assigned by Buyer or Buyer's Agent

elements.notes: Code specifying the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

elements.notes: Code identifying a party or other code

elements.notes: Numeric value of quantity

elements.name: Location Identifier
elements.notes: Code which identifies a specific location

segments.name: Transaction Totals
segments.notes: To transmit a hash total for a specific element in the transaction set

elements.name: Number of Line Items
elements.notes: Total number of line items in the transaction set

elements.name: Hash Total
elements.notes: Sum of values of the specified data element. All values in the data element will be summed without regard to decimal points (explicit or implicit) or signs. Truncation will occur on the left most digits if the sum is greater than the maximum size of the hash total of the data element. Example: -.0018 First occurrence of value being hashed. .18 Second occurrence of value being hashed. 1.8 Third occurrence of value being hashed. 18.01 Fourth occurrence of value being hashed. 18E2 Fifth occurrence of value being hashed. -------- 1873 Hash Total

name: Transaction Set Trailer
notes: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

elements.name: Number of Included Segments
elements.notes: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

elements.name: Transaction Set Control Number
elements.notes: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

name: Functional Group Trailer
notes: To indicate the end of a functional group and to provide control information

elements.name: Number of Transaction Sets Included
elements.notes: Total number of transaction sets included in the functional group or interchange (transmission) group terminated by the trailer containing this data element

elements.name: Group Control Number
elements.notes: Assigned number originated and maintained by the sender

name: Interchange Control Trailer
notes: To define the end of an interchange of zero or more functional groups and interchange-related control segments

elements.name: Number of Included Functional Groups
elements.notes: A count of the number of functional groups included in an interchange

elements.name: Interchange Control Number
elements.notes: A control number assigned by the interchange sender
